description:
Inatsuki Souta is http://anidb.net/ch133749 [Nozomi]`s father, owner of the FOX ONE eSports cafe and founder of http://anidb.net/ch148150 [Team FOX ONE].
All his past businesses (which there were many) failed due to him not being good with money and incurring debts.
He is overly enthusiastic about reading train timetables.
name: Inatsuki Souta
